actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.
Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia, H. Rept. 96-131.

official_title: A bill to authorize additional appropriations for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases from $16,000,000 to $38,000,000 the appropriation authorized for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia half of which shall be from funds in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, and half of which shall be from funds in the Treasury to the credit of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional appropriations for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
